timespan: January to April 2021, September 2021 to April 2022
summary:
Educated and evaluated computer science students at the university level.

Courses: Introduction to Computing Science I (CISC 121), Logic for Computing (CISC 204), and Game Design (CISC 226).

Empowered developers with powerful APIs and beautiful web components that seamlessly integrate into existing applications.
